DataElement.preferredName: Address Country Data Source Data Value Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.:A collective generic term that refers here to a wide variety of dependencies, areas of special sovereignty, uninhabited islands, and other entities in addition to the traditional countries or independent states._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:A collective generic term that refers here to a wide variety of dependencies, areas of special sovereignty, uninhabited islands, and other entities in addition to the traditional countries or independent states._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The collective generic term "Country" refers to a wide variety of dependencies, areas of special sovereignty, uninhabited islands, and other entities in addition to the traditional countries or independent states.
